verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: your] public pension safe states with the best retirement funding state governments spent close to 39 billion or about 120 per capita on retirement funding in 2015 state pension liabilities can strain overall state finances especially when the economy is already struggling and even put funding of other programs at risk retirement pension
